about_the_game:
Johnny Darke never anticipated the horrors awaiting him at The Requiem Sanatorium. On his first night, as darkness settles and the haunting hours begin, the sanatorium transforms. The walls, the furniture—everything becomes cloaked in an eerie, malevolent presence. Restless spirits drift through the halls, and a vengeful bride prowls, seeking a soul to claim as her eternal groom. To survive, Johnny must confront the shadows lurking in every corner and uncover the twisted secrets buried within the sanatorium. Is he losing his grip on reality, or has he stepped into something far darker?

You wake up in the dead of night, trapped in a desolate, decaying sanatorium shrouded in darkness. Something sinister lurks in the shadows—a ghostly bride, her hollow eyes burning with vengeful rage. With the oppressive atmosphere of Resident Evil and the psychological tension of Silent Hill, this survival horror game will test your resolve.

Explore the sanatorium’s eerie corridors, solve intricate puzzles, and piece together a chilling narrative of tragedy. But beware—the bride is always watching, and every step you take draws her closer. Stealth, strategy, and quick thinking are your only allies in this relentless game of cat and mouse. Will you uncover the secrets of the sanatorium, or will you become another victim of the Bride of the Abyss?

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains graphic depictions of blood, gore, dismemberment, and mutilated corpses. Psychological themes explore trauma, madness, and disturbing imagery, designed to evoke fear and unease. Viewer discretion is advised.
